data.message: Polish test infrastructure with stable imports and env var control: Added exports to migrations/__init__.py, DURO_SMOKE_APPLY_MIGRATIONS env var (=1 auto-apply, =0 strict), migrations dir logging. Commits d72a4b9 and 4b66563.

data.outcome: Added exports to migrations/__init__.py, DURO_SMOKE_APPLY_MIGRATIONS env var (=1 auto-apply, =0 strict), migrations dir logging. Commits d72a4b9 and 4b66563.
